snippet: The mixed martial arts fighter Gina Carano is making her big-screen debut in “Haywire,” a revenge thriller directed by Steven Soderbergh.
abstract: The mixed martial arts fighter Gina Carano is making her big-screen debut in Haywire, a revenge thriller directed by Steven Soderbergh, a collaboration that proved therapeutic for both of them.
lead_paragraph: The mixed martial arts fighter Gina Carano is making her big-screen debut in “Haywire,” a revenge thriller directed by Steven Soderbergh.

headline.seo: Gina Carano Makes Film Debut in ‘Haywire’
headline.main: From the Cage to the Screen, With Fists Flying
headline.print_headline: From the Cage To the Screen, With Fists Flying
